articles.title: Green Day to open 60th Super Bowl
articles.description:
The performance will celebrate six decades of the championship's history, with the band helping usher generations of Super Bowl MVPs onto the field.

The post Green Day to open 60th Super Bowl appeared first on Boston.com.

articles.title: Former Boston police superintendent sues department, says he was demoted for uncovering fraud
articles.description:
The police department’s deputy superintendent allegedly uncovered hundreds of department-wide paid detail fraud violations.
